channel.title: Others on Jamie's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Others on Jamie's Blog

item.title: Free CA Certs setup using Certbot + Docker + Nginx
item.description: Background Let’s Encrypt is a certificate authority that provides X.509 certificates for Transport Layer Security (TLS) encryption at no charge,The certificate is valid for 90 days, during which renewal can take place at anytime. 这样我们就可以用上免费的CA cert来安全expose我们自己的网站或者

item.title: Linux network proxy setup for desktop and terminal
item.description: 背景介绍 很多时候我们由于great firewall，我们无法访问某些网站，这时候就需要用到网络代理来应对一些比较urgent的case，本文

item.title: Harshicorp Vault Setup Config and integration with spring boot
item.description: Install vault Prepare docker-compose.yml, content as below (just a sample here, please don’t use it for production, there are more aspects should be considered) version: '3' services: consul: container_name: consul.server command: agent -server -bind 0.0.0.0 -client 0.0.0.0 -bootstrap-expect=1 image: consul:latest restart: always volumes: - ./consul.server/config:/consul/config - ./consul.server/data:/consul/data ports: - "9300:9300" - "9500:9500" - "9600:9600/udp" vault: container_name: vault.server image: vault ports: - "8200:8200" restart: always links: - consul:consul.server volumes: - ./vault.server/config:/mnt/vault/config

item.title: How to invoke python scripts in UIPath
item.description: UIPath是一个非常不错的RPA(Robotic Process Automation) 工具和平台，并且有开源社区版本可以方便RPA爱好者去尝试，本文是介绍如何在UIPath
